seriesStmt.title: František Ignác Antonín Tůma: A thematic catalogue of his works

annot.p: solo instrument missing in the single extant source (likely trb or org)

S solo and coro (14), A solo and coro (12), T solo and coro (13), B solo and coro (13), S coro (2x; 8, 8), A coro (2x; 8, 8), T coro (8), B coro (8), fl (2), clno 1 (4), clno 2 (4), trb 1 (7), trb 2 (6), vl 1 (2x; 20, 20), vl 2 (2x; 18, 18), vlc (15)
a copy by Joseph Leysser (except second set of S/A coro)

In the Inventar B, the title of the mass is spelled “MIſsa noVa sanC- | to BerthoLDo sa- | Cra”. The sum of the uppercase Roman numerals is M+I+V+C+L+D+C = 1756, which may be the year of composition or copying.
